page.title: 01THE AREA AROUND LLANGADOG
page.content: The area included in this "D" block is a rural one and includes one flourishing village,namely Llangadog. Large dairy herds are kept by the farmers in the fertile Towy Valley whilst sheep are reared on the nearby hills.Many people work in the various factories in the village which is served by both bus and rail services. The village of Llangadog is a very active one with the Community Centre being used by different organisations in the village every night of the week.There is a school,three chapels, church,hall,six public houses,doctor's surgery,various shops and a post office in the village.Throughout the year many events take place that involves many of the villagers with the Carnival and Show being the most popular.
